cause.description:
TechMission's Americorps members work at our Christian computer center sites throughout Boston and L.A. (soon to be NY, Chicago, Denver) in volunteer coordination, after school programs in the inner city, online publications editing, and teen coordinating.
1. After school and teen coordinating.
2. Christian computer center support.
3. Proficiency for all students and at risk community members.
cause.mission: TechMission assists organizations in using technology in urban ministry to help address injustice and develop at-risk communities. Techmission.org
cause.name: Afterschool programs for inner city youth.
